name: Trees Around the Branch Tour at Mount Dennis Library
description: Mount Dennis and its neighbourhood is home to a variety of trees. Join the City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff to explore the natural world on a local neighbourhood tour. Learn how to recognize different species and fun facts about their cultural and ecological importance. The tour will start and end at Mount Dennis. The City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff will guide it.

organizer.name: Urban Forestry, Natural Environment and Community Programs

name: Salsa On Market Street
description: Join us for salsa lessons and dancing, as well as a Latin American cultural celebration featuring Salsa dancing and live music.

name: Trees Around the Branch Tour at Jane/Sheppard Library
description:
The Jane/Sheppard Library and its neighbourhood is home to a variety of trees. Join City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff to explore the natural world on a local neighbourhood walk. Learn how to recognize different species and fun facts about their cultural and ecological importance.
Please note, the tour will start and end at the Jane/Sheppard Library. The City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff outside and around the neighbourhood where there may be uneven, unpaved surfaces will guide attendees. Please dress and prepare accordingly for this outdoor program (e.g. hats, sunscreen, water, comfortable shoes). This program takes place rain or shine. Drop-in only. No registration required.

organizer.name: Natural Environment and Community Programs Unit, Urban Forestry
